alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Roosevelt; Sheridan; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:25PM MDT until August 04 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Daniels County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Valley County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern Sheridan County in northeastern Montana... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 625 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southwest of Opheim, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scobey, Opheim, Richland, Flaxville, Port Of Whitetail, Lustre, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Whitetail, St. Marie, Port Of Opheim, Peerless, Four Buttes, West Fork, Volt, Navajo, Thoeny, Baylor and Glentana. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
